p: Conversely, despite the current global outbreak with many more patients affected, little is known about neurological manifestations in COVID-19 after 6 months. In this review, we will give an overview of these neurological manifestations reported due to SARS and MERS as this might be of great importance in dealing with the novel COVID-19. Additionally, we present a summary of the current knowledge—still evolving in literature—on neurological manifestations associated with SARS-CoV-2-infection.
